org.apache.river.test.share

Class TrackingOwner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.share.LeaseOwner
      • org.apache.river.test.share.TrackingOwner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForeverOwner

    public abstract class TrackingOwner
extends LeaseOwner
    Base class for owners that don't cause failures. Does basic management of the expiration and interaction with the test. Relies on abstract methods to validate extension and create/register leases.

    Renews the lease when asked. Ensures that the lease has not expired and that each time it is renewed it has been asked for the correct duration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackingOwner

        public TrackingOwner(long initialExpiration,
                     long maxExtension,
                     long desiredExpiration,
                     long slop,
                     long desiredRenewal,
                     Object notifyOnFailure,
                     QAConfig config)
        Simple constructor
        Parameters:
        initialExpiration - Initial expiration time for lease.
        maxExtension - Maximum time this owner will be willing to extend the lease
        desiredExpiration - Every lease a renewal service is renewing has a "membership expiration" associated with it. The renewal service should all-ways pick a renewal duration that when added to the current time equals this membership expiration time.
        slop - Allowable variance from desired expiration when making a renewal request.
        desiredRenewal - Expect value of the renewDuration parameter
        notifyOnFailure - Object to notify if there is an early failure
        config - QAConfig object

    • Method Detail

      • didPass

        public String didPass()
        Return null if no error has been detected, and a descriptive string otherwise. Checks rslt field to see if an error has been detected (subclasses should use setRsltIfNeeded to flag an error. Default implementation also makes sure that the lease expired close to the desired expiration, or that the lease's desired expiration has not been reached and the lease has not yet expired.

      • setRsltIfNeeded

        protected void setRsltIfNeeded(String newResult)
        Flag an error

      • getRslt

        protected String getRslt()
        Return the contets of the rslt field

      • isValidExtension

        protected abstract boolean isValidExtension(long extension)
        Return true if the passed extension is valid for this lease. Called from batchRenew() so the value of the now field is valid. If the extension is invalid should return false and set rslt

                throws net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException,
                       net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException
